casebody.data:
TERRANCE STEVENSON v. COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION (AC 20860)

Lavery, C. J., and Foti and O’Connell, Js.

Submitted on briefs December 13, 2001 officially released January 15, 2002 Per Curiam.

The trial court did not abuse its discretion in denying the petition for certification to appeal.

The appeal is dismissed.
